rooms.description: Large open-plan space combining living room, dining area, and a built-in entertainment center. Vastu guidelines recommend placement of south-east for prosperity.
Spacious bedroom with built-in storage; designed in the north-west sector per Vastu principles to promote mental well-being.
Connected to bedroom and living area. Designed for functionality and ease of access.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, with ample counter space and modern fixtures. The south-east direction is recommended for enhancing energy flow.
A central open courtyard providing natural light and ventilation. Fosters a sense of community and acts as a focal point following Vastu guidelines.
Two-car garage space at the rear side for convenient access to vehicles. Designed with robust construction elements for durability and functionality.
